body.name: Safety 1st Smooth Ride Travel System with OnBoard 35 LT Infant Car Seat, Monument
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 49 mins
features: This Safety 1st all-in-one travel system allows for a seamless transition from car to stroller. QuickClick technology secures the LATCH-equipped car seat to the stroller without disturbing your baby.
With exceptional side-impact protection, the included 35 LT rear-facing infant car seat includes added back and neck support for newborns.
An oversized canopy with flip-out visor and peek-a-boo window provides shade and airflow on sunny days and a convenient basket under the seat provides storage for baby items.
Designed for travel, the stroller is lightweight, has a fast, one-hand fold, and stands on its own when folded.
A five-point safety harness keeps children up to 50 pounds (in stroller mode) or up to 35 pounds (in car seat mode) safe and secure, with adjustable harness heights to provide a customized fit.
This JPMA-certified travel system exceeds ASTM standards for safety and includes a one-year limited warranty.
Safety 1st believes parenting should have fewer worries and more joyful moments so you enjoy every “first” your child experiences.
body.description: The Safety 1st Smooth Ride Travel System with Onboard 35 LT Infant Car Seat lets your baby ride with comfort and style. This all-in-one travel system allows for a seamless transition from car to stroller. QuickClick technology secures the Latch-equipped car seat to the stroller without disturbing your baby. With exceptional side-impact protection, the included 35 LT rear-facing infant car seat includes added back and neck support for newborns. An oversized canopy with flip-out visor and peek-a-boo window provides shade and airflow on sunny days and a convenient basket under the stroller seat provides storage for baby items. Designed for travel, the stroller is lightweight, has a fast, one-hand fold, and stands on its own when folded. A five-point safety harness keeps children up to 50 pounds (in stroller mode) or up to 35 pounds (in car seat mode) safe and secure, with adjustable harness heights to provide a customized fit. This JPMA-certified travel system stroller and car seat exceeds ASTM standards for safety and includes a one-year limited warranty. Safety 1st believes parenting should have fewer worries and more joyful moments. As the first and only leader in child safety, Safety 1st is here to give you peace of mind so you can spend less time worrying and more time enjoying every first you experience with your child.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safety 1st Smooth Ride Travel System Comfort and Safety On-The-Go The Safety 1st Smooth Ride Travel System makes strolling easy with everything you need to truly enjoy your time when out-and-about with your baby and none of the hassles other strollers are known for. The agile wheels provide maximum maneuverability around corners, while the flip-flop friendly brakes make it simple to put the stroller into park. With the car seat's built-in safety that exceeds Federal and ASTM standards (35209089, Juvenile Products Manufacturers Association, 2018), you can trust your baby is safe on road travels. Rear-facing 4-35 pounds Side Impact Protection Four harness heights spaced right for a better fit from tiny to tall Extra newborn support with head and body inserts Adjustable base for the right fit to your car Lightweight, easy to carry, and airplane ready Latch-equipped

Support and Protection for Baby The included onBoard 35 LT infant car seat provides your baby with a superior fit for superior safety while traveling. Have room for everything you need along the way—the parent and child trays are perfect for smaller items, with an extra-large storage basket for larger items. This stroller-car seat system is designed for both everyday and vacation convenience with flip flop friendly braking for long summer walks.

Ease-Of-Use for Parents Lift-To-Fold When you’re done for the day, there’s no struggling to fold the stroller thanks to the lift-to-fold design. It’s as simple as: Lift. Fold. Done. Peek-A-Boo Window The mesh Peek-a-boo window lets you keep an eye on your child, while also ventilating the hood for better airflow. Exceeds Federal and ASTM Safety Standards With a rear-facing weight rating of 4-35 pounds, the car seat keeps your baby safe with Side Impact Protection and Latch compatibility for quick and easy car installation.

About Safety 1st Over 30 years ago, the little yellow Safety 1st BABY ON BOARD sign became a badge of pride for new parents. Soon after, Safety 1st launched the first true collection of home safety products. This role has grown over the years as Safety 1st continues to introduce innovative products to parents, consistently giving parents the power to keep their children safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 7 Months and Still Going Strong - An Excellent Travel System
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Safety 1st Smooth Ride Travel System with the OnBoard 35 LT Infant Car Seat for a solid 17 months, and I'm thrilled to report that everything is in perfect working order. This travel system has proven to be reliable, durable, and has seamlessly met my expectations throughout its long-term use.First and foremost, the Safety 1st Smooth Ride Travel System has been a reliable companion for me and my little one. The car seat, in particular, has provided exceptional safety and comfort since day one. It's easy to secure in the car, and the OnBoard 35 LT Infant Car Seat is not only lightweight but also offers excellent protection for my child. The stroller, with its smooth ride and easy maneuverability, has made outings a breeze, and the canopy provides ample shade on sunny days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some of the reviews are misleading!!!!! Here’s some clarification on the misleading reviews
reviews.reviewText: I am writing this review because it’s really hard to find strollers that are good quality, not cheap or too expensive. I bought this stroller for my nephew/godson which is now 6 months old. We had a really hard time finding a good stroller and a lot of it had to do with misleading reviews! I saw a lot of reviews saying that when inserting the car seat into the stroller it falls right through, BUT this only happens if it is not installed correctly!! The bottom cup holder on the stroller (which is removable) must be in place to secure the car seat into place!Also, when inserting the car seat into a vehicle, it has a second piece which is the part you buckle into the car which also attaches and detaches from the car seat, then after that piece/base is installed and securely fastened into the vehicle, you then put the car seat right on top of the base until you hear the click. Just like with other car seats like this one, you may have to adjust the seat (usually passenger seat) For extra security. We’ve had this stroller for about a month, we’ve traveled overseas, had to go through the airport, and you name it, and this stroller has never once disappointed! It’s super easy to install and take apart IF YOU FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS!!! I just took this image to show how the stroller looks after a month of use, notice that the cup holder on the bottom is still in place to secure the car seat onto the stroller. It’s very comfortable, user friendly, and for those tall folks, the height of the stroller is great as you won’t have to bend over much to push the stroller. I personally love this as I am 5’7 and I do not have to bend over to push it. The only con is that it doesn’t have much storage, just the bottom part, you can fit a decent amount of things in it but it would be a nice bonus to have more storage. I am very happy with my purchase, I would by it again and I do recommend it!!!! My only advice is to remember to follow the instructions if you do purchase it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to assemble and very portable. I like the deal that you get with this stroller and car seat combo, everything works as it should but our baby girl needs a new one now because it’s too small for her, seatbelt part could have more length to be able to click in it’s so tight to the point you can’t even put two fingers in between. So for anyone considering purchasing this combo please keep this in mind and look at other options to save you some money in the long run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price. Would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: Quality stroller for good price. I waffled endlessly on purchasing a new stroller for my third baby. My old one was a Chico bravo and was good quality and cost twice as much as this one. I was worried it would be cheap and not convient as the other one I had. Low and behold in addition to the adorable and unique color (got the lavender one) this stroller is surprisingly good. It doesn’t run quite as smooth As the bravo but for the price a totally legit purchase. Only things I don’t like is the loud clicking when you adjust the canopy, wakes my sleeping baby, and the plastic latch that holds the stroller when you fold it In half. Just seems a tad flimsy. Wheels are decent. Storage is good. Parent tray fits my phone and has a little divet so it sits up. Baby likes it.Back over a year later.Still holding strong. The latch still works great. Canvas is stain resistant and a baby wipe gets any dirt off. My baby is almost two and we still use it regularly well worth the money!!!! The “noisey” canopy quieted down after some use. Great purchase for great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great car seat and stroller!
reviews.reviewText: Very good for the price, the quality seems to be good enough, easy to drive and to fold, comfy back pillow for the baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the easy to fold strap! It's light weight and so easy to assemble. The black and gray is so easy on the eyes! Love my travel set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a good product!
reviews.reviewText: I really love this car seat and its really easy to fold and put everything together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Car seat too big for my preemie
reviews.reviewText: Car seat was too big for my baby. He hates it and starts screaming the moment he is on the seat

Tenía mis dudas cuando la compré porque la adquirí en oferta y por el precio estaba dispuesto a pagar más por otras marcas, pero debo decir que me equivoqué.Tan solo al sacarla de la caja te das cuenta que estas comprado calidad, no le pide nada a otras marcas que evidentemente eso te venden, el nombre.El armado es sumamente sencillo, las instrucciones son claras y precisas, prácticamente viene armada tu solo ensamblas algunas piezas, nada laborioso.Es robusta, se siente la calidad en el ensamble y se nota que es un producto duradero con muy buena ergonomía e ingeniería en el diseño.Definitivamente vale su precio así que fue una ganga adquirirla por menos de la mitad, recomiendo ampliamente a la marca y no queda duda alguna de su calidad, si la ves en oferta no dudes en comprarla, no te vas arrepentir es justo lo que necesitas y estás buscando, además estás adquiriendo varios productos en 1.Sus ruedas son grandes para terrenos irregulares, se pliega fácilmente y ocupa muy poco espacio, todo su interior es acolchado y se percibe que ofrece buen agarre y absorción de impactos.Si bien no es el tipo de carriola que se compra para correr o realizar running con un bebé (si, hay personas así y productos para eso). Es excelente para las condiciones de uso normales y un producto de muy alta calidad para el costo que tiene, que como bien dije adquirí en oferta pero por el cual pagaría su precio original pues está bien merecido.Recomiendo adquirirla en oferta y realizar una compra inteligente ya que está al nivel de marcas como Chicco (tanto en precio como en calidad) y es muy superior a Prinsel así que puedes adquirir un producto de excelente calidad a un precio muy muy bajo en el mercado.
Muy buena carriola, precio-calidad justo, muy compacta, materiales se ven de buena calidad, fácil de armar y el auto asiento del bebé está cómodo y funciona correctamente

Está excelente, no es estorbosa, rueda bien, la inclinación no es si fuerte pero cumple con su propósito. Desde recién nacido con el adaptador y mi bebé ya tiene 1.5 años y sigue en óptimas condiciones. Perfecto para nuevos papás, e visto a otros sufriendo con carriolas enormes.

reviews.reviewTitle: M m e gusto el logo”la seguridad primero”
reviews.reviewText: Viene en camino mi primer nieto y de todo lo que compre en Amazon fue difícil escoger , este portabebe y su carreola, con adaptador para sentarlo en la parte trasera del auto. De todas las marcas este me gusto y en verdad tiene muchos puntos de seguridad, fácil de transportar , Antes de que llegara fuimos a Estados unidos y una tienda de Sears en Denver lo vi , buenos materiales, bonito y de verdad muy seguro, lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewerName: Llego en tiempo y es súper practica, la pedimos porque estaba en promoción y fue la mejor compra. Somos nuevos papás y el porta bebé está muy acolchonado y es fácil de instalar. La carriola no se siente bromista y estorbosa al contrario es muy cómoda y práctica, las llantas están muy firmes. Muy fácil de armar y se cierra en un paso.Altamente recomendada!!Llego en tiempo y es súper practica, la pedimos porque estaba en promoción y fue la mejor compra. Somos nuevos papás y el porta bebé está muy acolchonado y es fácil de instalar. La carriola no se siente bromista y estorbosa al contrario es muy cómoda y práctica, las llantas están muy firmes. Muy fácil de armar y se cierra en un paso.Altamente recomendada!!
reviews.reviewText: Somos nuevos papás y la pedimos solo porque estaba en promoción pero nos sorprendió, súpero las expectativas.Es muy practica, no se siente bromosa o estorbosa al contrario es muy cómoda y es muy firme.El porta bebé viene muy acolchonado y cómodo y es facil de instalar en el carro.Es fácil de armar y fácil de cerrar (en un paso).Nos llegó en tiempo y en excelentes condiciones!Altamente recomendable!
